format.title: Archive format
format.description: Archive format for compressing folder; one of [null (submenu), 'zip', 'tgz', 'tar.gz', 'tbz', 'tbz2', 'tar.bz', 'tar.bz2', 'txz', 'tar.xz']

followSymlinks.title: Follow Symlinks
followSymlinks.description: Whether or not to resolve symlinks and add resulting files to the archive; one of ['true', 'false']

downloadHidden.title: Download Hidden Files
downloadHidden.description: Whether or not to add hidden files to the archive when downloading; one of ['true', 'false']
